goals.active: Put an end to Bercilak's cruelty.
goals.complete: I met with Bercilak at Mabon Market and challenged him to another duel. This time, I was prepared for the advantage of his armor. Bercilak has been destroyed, and will never hurt anyone else.

I spoke with the Pale Tree and told her about defeating Bercilak. I asked her about the Dream, and she told me that only two sylvari have ever dreamed of facing the dragons head-onâ€”me, and Caithe. I wonder what that means? Nevertheless, the Mother was proud of me, and I look forward to my next adventure.
